channel.title: Explaining a code

item.title: Explaining a code
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

mining[0] = 1; mining[1] = 1;

what is that used for?

also,

if (misc.random(2) == 1) { mining[2] = 70; } else { mining[2] = 71;
does that mean that it will randomly witch between mining[2] = 70 and mining[2] = 71? if it does can you please explain it a bit more.

Read full topic
